main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.uiexamples.htsmlm.autopilot.finder

Class SimpleFocusFinder<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.embl.rieslab.emu.uiexamples.htsmlm.autopilot.finder.SimpleFocusFinder<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - object representing position
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    FocusFinderInterface<O>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DetrendingFocusFinder

    public class SimpleFocusFinder<O>
extends java.lang.Object
implements FocusFinderInterface<O>
    This focus finder implementation is the simplest one. It just finds the image with highest focus measure value. More elaborate focus finders derive from this class.
    Author:
    royer

        public void clear()
        Description copied from interface: FocusFinderInterface
